how_to_submit.question: How do I submit my music to HLPFL Records?
how_to_submit.answer: You can submit your music through our online submission form at hlpfl.org/submit. Please include 2-3 of your best tracks, a brief bio, and links to your social media profiles.

submission_requirements.question: What are your submission requirements?
submission_requirements.answer: We accept submissions in all genres. Please ensure your tracks are professionally recorded and mixed, include high-quality artwork, and provide information about your musical background and career goals.

response_time.question: How long does it take to hear back about submissions?
response_time.answer: We review all submissions carefully and typically respond within 2-4 weeks. If you haven't heard back after 4 weeks, feel free to follow up via email.

unsolicited_submissions.question: Do you accept unsolicited submissions?
unsolicited_submissions.answer: Yes! We actively review all submissions through our official submission portal. We're always looking for talented artists to join our roster.

cost.question: How much do your services cost?
cost.answer: Our pricing varies depending on the specific services and scope of work. We offer customized packages based on each artist's needs and goals. Contact us for a personalized consultation and quote.

contracts.question: What kind of contracts do you offer?
contracts.answer: We offer flexible contract arrangements including development deals, distribution agreements, and traditional record deals. All contracts are artist-friendly and transparent.

royalties.question: What's your royalty split?
royalties.answer: Royalty splits vary by deal type and artist level. We believe in fair compensation and typically offer industry-leading royalty rates. Specific terms are discussed during contract negotiations.

founded.question: When was HLPFL Records founded?
founded.answer: HLPFL Records was founded in 2009 in Nashville, Tennessee. We've been serving independent artists for over 15 years.

artists.question: How many artists are on your roster?
artists.answer: We currently work with 50+ artists across various genres. We focus on quality over quantity and provide personalized attention to each artist.

success_stories.question: Can you share some success stories?
success_stories.answer: Our artists have achieved over 1 billion streams collectively, landed major playlist placements, and secured record deals with major labels. Many have built sustainable careers in the music industry.
